resources.string: Click on this button to start the process of hiding your message in the chosen cover image.
Click on this button to start the process of extracting the message from the uploaded image.

Click on this button to save the encoded image in .png format to your mobile gallery. If you wish to share the encoded image through file transfer software or social media apps like Whatsapp, share the image as a document to avoid internal compression and thus, loss of data.
Click on this button to upload an image where you can hide your message. Only JPEG or PNG images are allowed.
Click on this button to upload an encoded image from which you wish to extract a hidden message. Only PNG images are allowed as JPEG images involve lossy compression which may lead to loss of data.
Click on this button if you want to hide a secret message in a JPEG/PNG image using a password for future verification.
Click on this button if you want to extract a secret message from a JPEG/PNG image after password verification.
This application is made for commercial purposes. Any queries or feedback related to the app can be conveyed to us at xyz@gmail.com. For any discrepancies, reach out to us at abc@gmail.com.
Q1. What is the major use of this application?

A1. This application implements steganography which allows users to hide their private data inside images without the fear of detection. Only authorized people can access the decoded data from the encoded images after password verification.

A2. The algorithm for steganography implemented in this application ensures that the final encoded image contains imperceptible changes so that the existence of a hidden message is not detectable by anyone except the user. The user can use a password to encode the secret message so that she/he can allow only authorized recipients to access the hidden data by verifying the password.
Q3. Is there any limitation on usage?
A3. This application has been made to meet the satisfaction of the customers. There are no bounds on the limits of usage.
